properties.name: Philadelphia, PA
properties.summary: Philadelphia, PA changes name of school police officers, now calling them "safety officers."

properties.name: Portland, OR
properties.summary: Portland, OR removes police officers from schools

properties.name: Minneapolis, MN
properties.summary: Minneapolis, MN removes police officers from schools

properties.name: Saint Paul, MN
properties.summary: St. Paul, MN removes police officers from schools

properties.name: Denver, CO
properties.summary: Denver, CO removes police officers from schools

properties.name: Chicago, IL
properties.summary: Chicago, IL school board votes 4-3 to keep contract with police, but are going to reconsider decision at the end of this summer. Update 7/13: Chicago public school sets precedent by removing SROs on their own. 7/17 update: Chicago Public Schools releases “kit” for local councils to consider removing police from schools, advises subsidiary districts to hear from parents, students, and teachers. (considering removing police from schools)

properties.name: Oakland, CA
properties.summary: Oakland, CA eliminates district police department, removing police from schools

properties.name: Madison, WI
properties.summary: Madison, WI removes police from schools

properties.name: Toronto, Canada
properties.summary: Toronto, Canada removes police from schools

properties.name: Seatle, WA
properties.summary: Seattle, WA removes police from schools for one year. Update 7/13: Seattle school board modifies resolution to be indefinite.

properties.name: Edmonds, WA
properties.summary: Edmonds, WA removes police officers from three high schools, further decision being made in August. Update 7/13: district permanently cut ties with police at three schools, considering fourth in August following review of school safety standards.

properties.name: Los Angeles, CA
properties.summary: LA, CA rejects reforming/defunding police

properties.name: Milwaukee, WI
properties.summary: Milwaukee, WI removes police from schools

properties.name: Charlottesville, VA
properties.summary: Charlottesville, VA removes police from schools

properties.name: San Francisco, CA
properties.summary: San Francisco, CA removes police from schools

properties.name: San Jose, CA
properties.summary: San Jose Unified School District to decide whether to cut SROs in August.

properties.name: Alum Rock Union/East Side Union (San Jose, CA)
properties.summary: Alum Rock Union/East Side Union Districts removing police from schools now.

properties.name: New York City, NY
properties.summary: Mayor Bill deBlasio says he wants to keep police in schools, no formal decision made. Police commissioner Dermot Shea open to scaling back traffic and school law enforcement presence. 7/13 update: SROs limited on arresting students for minor crimes, like marijuana possession.

properties.name: Portland, ME
properties.summary: Portland, ME removes police from schools

properties.name: Washington, DC
properties.summary: District of Columbia Schools cuts ties with police department, makes itself responsible for security guards

properties.name: Dallas, TX
properties.summary: Protesters, advocacy groups demand removing police officers from schools, Superintendent declines, releases letter acknowledging faults of police in schools.

properties.name: Boston, MA
properties.summary: Boston city counselors call for further consideration of removing police officers from schools. Update 7/13: Boston district names new Chief of Safety Department.

properties.name: Stockton, CA
properties.summary: Stockton, CA school board considers removing police from schools, deciding as soon as next month

properties.name: Moreno Valley, CA
properties.summary: Moreno Valley, CA school board considers removing police from schools, hears from public. School district near Moreno Valley resolves to survey students’ opinions on SROs.

properties.name: Sacramento, CA
properties.summary: Sacramento, CA school board removes police from schools.

properties.name: Tacoma, WA
properties.summary: Tacoma, WA Education Association passes resolution to remove SROs from school, pending approval from Tacoma Public Schools’ board of directors.

properties.name: Louisville, KY
properties.summary: Louisville, KY removed police from schools for 2019-20 school year August 2019, intending to create district SROs for 2020-21 school year.

properties.name: Detroit, MI
properties.summary: Detroit, MI public schools moving away from hiring security guards, continuing to talk with community about other police presence in schools.

properties.name: Omaha, NE
properties.summary: Omaha, NE public schools considering removing police from schools, changing school drug policies to not mandate police presence.

properties.name: Wilmington, DE
properties.summary: Wilmington, DE school board introduced resolution to remove SROs, replace with counselors, pending vote on July 8th following public forum. Update 7/17: Wilmington DE school board voted 5-2 to keep their SROs.

properties.name: Prince George County, MD
properties.summary: School districts in Maryland’s Prince George and Montgomery counties consider removing armed police from schools, tabled until fall.

properties.name: Montgomery County, MD
properties.summary: School districts in Maryland’s Prince George and Montgomery counties consider removing armed police from schools, tabled until fall.

properties.name: Cincinnati, OH
properties.summary: Cincinnati, OH schools considering removing police from schools, exploring other options.

properties.name: Columbus, OH
properties.summary: Columbus, OH schools let contract expire with police department, holding public forum to discuss future of SROs. Update 7/13: Columbus district removes 22 officers from city schools.

properties.name: Framingham, MA
properties.summary: Framingham, MA Superintendent wants to reconsider SROs in schools, meets with community to discuss alternatives.

properties.name: Christina, DE
properties.summary: Christina, DE schools vote to renew contract with police.

properties.name: Salem, OR
properties.summary: Salem, OR hears from community, tabled until end of summer.

properties.name: Evanston, IL
properties.summary: Evanston, IL considers alternatives to police officers.

properties.name: Platteville, WI
properties.summary: Platteville, WI reconsiders adding a police officer to their secondary school.

properties.name: Skokie, IL
properties.summary: Skokie, IL considers removing police, police union threats to never again help schools should police contract be terminated.

properties.name: Duluth, MN
properties.summary: Duluth, MN superintendent expresses interest in continuing discussing alternatives to having police in schools in the fall. School board members tentatively say they will vote on renewing the district’s contract with the police July 21st.

properties.name: Helena, MT
properties.summary: Helena, MT considers removing police from schools.

properties.name: Burlington, VT
properties.summary: Burlington, VT school board recommends keeping police in schools.

properties.name: Kalamazoo, MI
properties.summary: Kalamazoo, MI hears from community about police presence in schools, decides to renew contract with police department.

properties.name: Columbia, MO
properties.summary: Columbia, MO removes police officers from schools.

properties.name: Rochester, NY
properties.summary: Rochester, NY removes police from schools.

properties.name: Tucson, AZ
properties.summary: Tucson, AZ considers removing police from schools.

properties.name: Lewiston, ME
properties.summary: Lewiston, ME considers removing some police from schools, replacing with counselors. Proposal scheduled to be discussed on July 13th, but meeting was postponed to an undecided date due to safety concerns about COVID-19.

properties.name: Concord, NH
properties.summary: Concord, NH: Governor tasks commission on police transparency to come up with recommendations for changing SROs by July 31st.

properties.name: Phoenix, AZ
properties.summary: Phoenix, AZ removes police from schools.

properties.name: Allentown, PA
properties.summary: Allentown, PA (and Bethlehem, PA) considers removing police from schools.

properties.name: Bethlehem, PA
properties.summary: Bethlehem, PA (and Allentown, PA) considers removing police from schools.
